ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who give their wealth to purify themselves -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And gives of his wealth that he may grow in virtue,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the Godfearing who spends his wealth to purify himself;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and purify themselves will be safe from this fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Who gives his wealth in order to be pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He who gives of his wealth for self-purification.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who gives away his wealth, purifying himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: even he who gives his wealth. to purify himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who giveth his wealth that he may grow (in goodness).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: one who gives his wealth to become purified,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who giveth away his substance that he may be cleansed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —he who gives his wealth to purify himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who spend their wealth for increase in self-purification,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He who spends his wealth for increase in self-purification,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He who gives his wealth to be purified,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who gives his money to become pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:18]   he who gives his wealth to purify himself, offering it as a [means of self] purification before God, exalted be He, by making this payment for the sake of God, exalted be He, and not for show or the sake of reputation, so that he [or the offering] stands purified in the sight of God. This [verse] was revealed regarding the truthful one (al-siddīq) [Abū Bakr], may God be pleased with him, when he purchased Bilāl [the Ethiopian], who was being tortured on account of his faith, and then freed him, whereat the disbelievers said, ‘He only did this in return for a favour which he [must have] owed him’, and so the following was revealed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Who giveth his wealth) in the way of Allah, i.e. Abu Bakr al-Siddiq (that he may grow (in goodness)) intending by that Allah's Countenance alone,
